Monterey_Park.Athenaeum at Caltech:
The Athenaeum is a faculty club and private social club on the California Institute of Technology campus in Pasadena, California.


== Building ==
The Athenaeum was designed by Gordon Kaufmann in the Mediterranean Revival style, with landscape design by Florence Yoch and Lucile Council, and opened in 1930. It includes a restaurant, a private hotel with several named suites (e.g.
